Uses of Interface
sep.gaia.renderer.layer.DrawableLayer

  • Packages that use DrawableLayer 
    Package Description
    sep.gaia.renderer  
    sep.gaia.renderer.layer  

    • Uses of DrawableLayer in sep.gaia.renderer

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Constructors in sep.gaia.renderer with parameters of type DrawableLayer 
      Constructor and Description
      Mode2D(DrawableLayer drawableLayer)
      Initializes the draw-mode by specifying the lowest layer to be drawn.

    • Uses of DrawableLayer in sep.gaia.renderer.layer

      Classes in sep.gaia.renderer.layer that implement DrawableLayer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractLayer
      Implements the DrawableLayer interface and implements the add(DrawableLayer layer) method.
      class  BBoxDebugLayer 
      class  CompassLayer
      The CompassLayer indicates the rotation of the map in 2d mode.
      class  CopyrightLayer 
      class  MarkerLayer
      The marker option save marked places persistant.
      class  POILayer
      For all POIs appearing on the current map section, a appropriate icon will be drawn.
      class  ScreenshotLayer 
      class  TileLayer
      The TileLayer is the first layer that is drawn in GAIA.
      class  WeatherLayer
      This layer draws the current weather information in a box in one corner of the GLCanvas.
      class  WikipediaLayer
      This layer draws "Wikipedia"-POIs symbols for all places of the current map section for which a wikipedia article exists.
      Methods in sep.gaia.renderer.layer with parameters of type DrawableLayer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void AbstractLayer.add(DrawableLayer layer) 
      void DrawableLayer.add(DrawableLayer layer)
      Let this DrawableLayer implementation add another DrawableLayer whose draw is called, after this DrawableLayer has finished its render process.
